name: WildStar: Jumpstart Pack
detailed_description:
Get instant access to Housing, Décor, Hoverboards, and more!

Grab the Jumpstart Pack and get your character rocketing toward success! With bonuses and goodies like a 16 slot bag, some spending cash, early access to housing, and a hoverboard, the Jumpstart Pack will help set you off on your adventures.

The Jumpstart Pack includes:

Bag of Big Beginnings (16-slot Bag)
Housewarming Gift Pack (Housing Décor)
Flask of Advancement (1x 3 hour XP Potion)
Shardspire Canyon FABkit (Jump Puzzle Challenge)
Blue Steel Hoverboard with Flare (Mount)
Housing Teleport (Immediate Access to Housing)
New Homesteaders Allowance (5 gold)

short_description: Get instant access to Housing, Décor, Hoverboards, and more!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® XP SP3 (32-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® Core2 Duo 2.4 GHz, AMD Phenom™ X3 2.3 GHz, or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® 8800 GT, ATI® Radeon® HD 4850, or better
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista® (64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 Quad Core 2.66GHz or better, AMD Phenom™ II X4 3GHz, or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 460, Radeon® HD 5830, or better
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
